It is the most completed and detailed encyclopedia of military aircraft available on the App Store. It is an ideal reference tool for people who love military as well as those who are interested to become a pilot. For most aircrafts included in this app, the following information is available:â High Quality Photoâ Model Numberâ Role of the aircraftâ Manufacturerâ First flightâ Status (retired/active)â Primary userâ Year of productionâ Number builtâ Detailed descriptionsâ Design & developmentâ Specificationsâ Cost (if applicable)The application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââWHAT YOU WILL EXPECTThis application has the following features:â An interface to preview all models in one viewâ The ability to bookmark selected models for easier referenceâ Cross-referencing links to other modelsâ A model search engineâ Offline browsingâââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.

reviews.title: Nice but
reviews.comment: Please update to allow us to store this memory hog on SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I\'ll give it a 4 for what it is, but there aren\'t any helos... That\'s the reason I bought it.. I\'m a helo mech, I need info on helos.. The keyword search also sucks...
reviews.author: A Google User
